conditionalComponent.label: Attach a copy of the court order
conditionalComponent.name: courtorderupload

conditionalComponent.hint: Download, fill in and attach [Form C2](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-c2-application-for-permission-to-start-proceedings-for-an-order-or-directions-in-existing-proceedings-to-be-joined-as-or-cease-to-be-a-part) (for family cases) or [Form D11](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-d11-application-notice) (for divorce cases)
conditionalComponent.label: Attach form asking for permission
conditionalComponent.name: permissionform

components.legend: Do you have a written court order giving you permission?
components.name: familycourtorder
